tasks.task_description: Examine project structure and identify all relevant files
Check package.json and configuration files for company name
Review website content and components for company name usage
Identify any inconsistencies and create a report

description: Check and standardize company name "Numeric Shift" across all project files and website
context: Found project name "numericsins" in package.json, which doesn't match "Numeric Shift". Need to check website content and other files.

Found multiple inconsistencies: 1) Package.json uses 'numericsins', 2) Layout.tsx uses 'Lumina | Precision Engineering', 3) Navbar uses 'Numeric SHIFT', 4) Footer uses 'LUMINA', 5) About section uses 'Lumina', 6) Contact uses 'lumina.tech' email. Need to standardize all to 'Numeric Shift'.
Successfully updated all files to use 'Numeric Shift' consistently across the project. Changed package.json name, layout metadata, navbar, footer, about section, and contact email.
